Package model

Class CourseList

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.CourseList
  • public class CourseList
extends java.lang.Object
    The class represents CourseList that stores list of courses as well as a few methods that interact with said list.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      CourseList()
      One-argument constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      method is meant for adding a new course to the course list.

      method meant to call a course by its index in the array list.

      method intended for to get course by name.

      method is intended to get size of the list

      method removing a specific course from the courselist.

      method intended to output the list of courses in a readable manner.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CourseList

        public CourseList()
        One-argument constructor. In the constructor we initialize the instance variable as a new array list that will store a list of courses.

    • Method Detail

      • addCourse

        public void addCourse​(Course course)
        method is meant for adding a new course to the course list.
        Parameters:
        course - a course object that needs to be added. does not return anything as it is a void method.

      • getCourseByName

        public Course getCourseByName​(java.lang.String courseName)
        method intended for to get course by name. In the method, for-loop is used to loop through all course list items and if-statement inside the loop to compare the needed course name with course names in the course list. If a name does not exist the exception will be thrown.
        Parameters:
        courseName - the course with the name that needs to be found
        Returns:
        the course with the specified name of an exception.

      • getNumberOfCourses

        public int getNumberOfCourses()
        method is intended to get size of the list
        Returns:
        the amount of courses is in the list.

      • getCourse

        public Course getCourse​(int index)
        method meant to call a course by its index in the array list.
        Parameters:
        index - position of the item inside the array list.
        Returns:
        course by index.

      • removeCourse

        public void removeCourse​(Course course)
        method removing a specific course from the courselist.
        Parameters:
        course - - object

      • removeCourseByIndex

        public void removeCourseByIndex​(int index)
        method removing a course from the courselist by index.
        Parameters:
        index -

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        method intended to output the list of courses in a readable manner. s variable is created to store all a value of all created courses. In the for-loop it loops through the array list and adds each item to the s string.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        s string with all created courses in a readable manner.S
